message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in quality and excellence. We believe its value far exceeds $12000, but considering your unique needs and potential benefits, we're offering it to you at a special introductory price of $15000. This is an exclusive opportunity to own something truly remarkable at a fantastic value. Please let us know if you're interested in discussing this further.
